Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Oceancrest Avenue near an entrance to the Ashton Falls Resort.
Room.LongDescription: A large wall on the north side of the road surrounds the famous resort, but a very ornate gate is set into a portico and a guard station stands just inside. There is a broad walkway to the south, leading to a shopping center with small shops and restaurants. An exclusive night spot is near the entrance to the midway.
